welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Galapagar, Spain! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of this city known for its stunning natural landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Galapagar has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights and some European destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Barajas Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights at Barajas Airport, with state-of-the-art facilities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 15 minutes.
